channel.title: [525] Compiler [525]
channel.description:
Ok so im not much of a 525 coder but anyone know how to fix this problem..
Here is my code for compiler [code]@echo off echo Compiling all files... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./src/*.java pause[/code]
And here is the error I get [code]Compiling all files... Javac: file not found: .\src\*.java Usage: javac <Options> <Source files> Use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Anyone have an Idea what that means? (Sorry for being a noob all you 525 coders.)

item.title: [525] Compiler [525]
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Marvelscape is very buggy, but here, this should work

@echo off title Compiling MarvelScape525 echo Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -d build -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j18-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/net/com/codeusa/Engine.java pause

Remember to set your Java paths properly, if you dont know how to let me know and ill teach you.

Read full topic
